cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 99999 (exceeds maximum port number) will cause network configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power) will cause configuration validation failure in the uplink power configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為 100（超過最大允許功率）會在上行功率配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
